import { useState } from 'react' import logo from '../../assets/logos/wc-logo.png' import RoadToOne from '../../assets/logos/one-show-road-to-one-v2.PNG' import EventDetailPage from './EventDetailPage' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' export default function EventCard({ handleClick, event }) { return (
{handleClick(event)}} key={event.id} className="group relative">

#{event.event_number} {event.name}

{event.date} @ {event.location}

)}
